title: Ensure newly seeded catalog products render without broken images

requirements.summary: Harden product image rendering so newly seeded products never display broken image icons and fall back to the existing placeholder when imgPath is empty or fails to load.
acceptanceCriteria: The homepage renders additional ProductCard tiles for both "Turtle Wax" and "3M" without broken image icons.
If any product imgPath is empty, the ProductCard uses the existing fallback image path "/assets/generated/product-placeholders-set.dim_1200x800.png".

file_operations.description: Update ProductCard image handling to (1) continue using the existing fallback when product.imgPath is empty and (2) add a runtime onError fallback so that invalid/unreachable imgPath values automatically swap to "/assets/generated/product-placeholders-set.dim_1200x800.png" instead of showing a broken image icon.
